name: com.dimati.physics.buttons
description:
World buttons with interactor, physics based. Using OnTriggerEnter and OnTriggerExit for register interactions.
  For supporting Unity_XR_Interaction_Toolkit: 
 1) Import sample. 
 2) Add #define USE_UNITY_XRI_TOOLKIT 

 if you don't import sample with support Unity_XR_Interaction_Toolkit you can see missing ref in runtime.asmdef it's ok. It's reference for Unity_XR_Interaction_Toolkit.asmdef which in the hiden samples folder
author: DimaTi <timofeenkodima@gmail.com> (https://github.com/dimaTidev)
